cancellation_rules.description:
Cancellation not allowed 
Amendment not allowed

promo_list.offer_description: Avail this offer to get 28% off on your booking

additional_info.tariff_notes:
CheckIn instructions:
  • Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy
  • Government-issued photo identification and a credit card, debit card, or cash deposit may be required at check-in for incidental charges
  • Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges; special requests cannot be guaranteed
  • Guests must contact this property in advance to reserve cribs/infant beds and rollaway/extra beds
  • This property accepts credit cards, debit cards, and cash
  • Safety features at this property include a fire extinguisher, a security system, and a first aid kit
  • Please note that cultural norms and guest policies may differ by country and by property; the policies listed are provided by the property
  • This property’s 54th-floor infinity pool is restricted to guests 18 years of age and older.
CheckIn special instructions: Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival. Mandatory fees:

You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the property. Fees may include applicable taxes:

  • A tax is imposed by the city: AED 20.00 per accommodation, per night

We have included all charges provided to us by the property.

Optional fees:
  • Fee for continental breakfast: approximately AED 148 per person
  • Rollaway bed fee: AED 350.0 per night

The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change.

Know before you go:
  • One child 3 years old or younger stays free when occupying the parent or guardian's room, using existing bedding.
  • Only registered guests are allowed in the guestrooms.
  • No pets and no service animals are allowed at this property.
  • Contactless check-in and contactless check-out are available.
Additional fees for 2 people: Name: mandatory_tax, Cost: 5.45 USD Tax Recovery Charges and Service Fees for 2 people: 53.57 USD (This amount is included within the total price).
additional_info.short_tariff_notes: CheckIn instructions: Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy Government-issued photo identification and a credit card, debit
